headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. Use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ and /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ endpoint to get or renew an access token.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: No of videos per request. Can be a number from 1 to 10. By default the value is 10.

parameters.name: video_ids
parameters.description: The ids of specific videos to get information.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Return the videos before a time stamp value (in milliseconds). By default the value is 0 and the most recent videos will be returned.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The return code. For the complete list of error codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The return message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.

fields.name: likes
fields.description: Number of likes of the video.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Number of comments made to the video.

fields.name: shares
fields.description: Number of shares of the video.

fields.name: video_views
fields.description: Number of views of the video. This is the number of times someone started playing your video. Replays will not be counted.

fields.name: engagement_count
fields.description: Number of likes and comments and shares combined.

fields.name: thumbnail_url
fields.description: URL to the thumbnail of the video. The URL expires in 6 hours. The expiration time is included in the URL. Example: https://p16-sign-sg.tiktokcdn.com/tos-maliva-p-0068/1f9a445423844b82bd79317b42b9953f~c5_300x400.webp?x-expires=1614034800&x-signature=qChosOGafzBcTctPm9zYiF8Y2MA%3D .

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: Time when this video is created.

fields.name: has_more
fields.description: Indicate if more videos are available.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: Value of the next cursor to request to get videos.
